Title: Distance
Actors: Arata Iura, YÃ»suke Iseya, Susumu Terajima, Yui Natsukawa
Plot: Members of a cult, modeled on Aum Shinrikyo, sabotage a city's water supply, then commit mass suicide near the shores of a lake. Family members of those affected by it meet at the lake to observe the anniversary of their loved ones' deaths.
